description: A challenging hike offering some nice views of Port Coquitlam and Coquitlam.
directions: From Coast Meridian Rd turn left and head west on David Ave for 4.4 km and then turn right onto Lansdowne Dr for 500 m and turn left onto Panorama Dr for 600 m and turn right onto Eagle Mountain Dr for 1.6 km and the trail head will be on the left.
title: Cypress Lake Hike
